description:
’47 is a sports lifestyle brand founded in Boston, MA, by twin brothers, Arthur and Henry D’Angelo in 1947. The D’Angelos were entrepreneurial pioneers who were quick to see the future of sports licensing by selling pennants and other sports memorabilia on the streets around Fenway Park. Through a combination of hard work, sound instincts, and incredible passion, the brothers grew their business from a single street cart to a premier sports lifestyle brand that uniquely melds sport and style. 

’47 is a proud partner of the MLB, NFL, NHL, NBA, MLS, MLL, and over 900 collegiate programs.
tagline: Sports lifestyle brand based out of Boston, MA since 1947.

description:
à la Sparke is an online 'a la carte' event styling company.

We say styling, not planning, because we don’t plan…we don’t do budgets or timelines and it's à la carte because we won't take control over your entire event, you tell us where you want us and we're there to add sparke where your celebration needs it most, including the second (but almost equally) important piece - what you're wearing! In an industry where event planning services are typically bundled together, we’re separating out each element to give you greater choice at a lower cost.

For a flat fee (no hourly rates here) you can delegate portions of your event to us, and our stylists will electronically (going green anyone?!) deliver their expertise right to your inbox within 3 business days... and you still get to claim the props for an amazing event! It's your vision, on your budget...
name: à la Sparke

description:
Mission: Étoile Academy Charter School ensures that every student in grades 5 through 8 has the academic and character foundation necessary to succeed in high school, graduate from college, and pursue ambitious life goals.

Vision: Étoile Academy Charter School is founded on the belief that all students can achieve academic success and a college diploma with the right supports. Our educational philosophy is based in seven core principles. These core principles come from the best practices of successful charter schools nationwide. Our core principles are outlined below.

High academic expectations for all students inform every school design element.
Supportive, targeted interventions for all learners are frequent and required.
Data-driven, quality instruction informs all classroom instruction, individual supports, and professional development needs.
Highly structured routines, infused with joy and encouragement, support achievement.
Intentional character development allows all students to build school and life success.
Family involvement, driven by a clear mission, unites the entire school community.
Measurable educational goals hold all adults accountable for student success.
name: Étoile Academy Charter School
tagline: WE ARE A 5-8 GRADE MIDDLE SCHOOL IN HOUSTON PREPARING STUDENTS TO LEAD AMBITIOUS LIVES.

description:
Älsa is a great-tasting, twice-daily solution for active adults who want a healthy energy lift without the jolt or crash of the typical energy drink. Its unique blend of clinically tested premium ingredients delivers a steady, measured flow of energy to support the way you live every day, all day. 

Älsa comes in three refreshing flavors: Dragon Fruit, Pomegranate Blueberry, and Three Citrus.  Just dissolve a single-dose powder packet in 16 oz. of water, blend into a smoothie, sprinkle over yogurt, or enjoy in your favorite recipe. Make it your twice-daily ritual to maximize benefits.

Vegan and gluten-free, Älsa is naturally sweetened with fructose and stevia extract and naturally flavored for a light, pleasing taste. It contains 19 vitamins, minerals, amino acids, and electrolytes.These are coupled with PURENERGY™ and Cognizin® Citicoline, two clinically tested sustained energy and cognitive function ingredients. Combined with caffeine from white tea extract and yerba mate extract, they provide the smarter, steady lift you need to get through what you have to do and on to all the things you want to do. Every day.
name: Älsa Energy

Strategies that give my clients a high Return on Investment from the start by incorporating the perfect balance of high traffic and relevancy. I am so confident in my services, I will never ask for a contract. I believe that performance outweighs a contract any day.

Google Ads is truly a passion to me. I have worked with Google Ads for almost 7 years, and I still find it as rewarding as I did in the beginning. I have always enjoyed the challenge of Google Ads. It is a highly in depth marketing platform that can perform like a well-oiled marketing machine, or like a black hole that sucks money into a never returning abyss. Obviously, everyone wants it to perform like a well-oiled marketing machine, not a money sucking black hole. This is where strategy comes in. It takes strategy that can only be developed through thousands of hours of working with Google Ads and thousands of dollars of ad spend.

The strategies that I have developed over the years are what I give my clients, making certain they get a high ROI for their marketing dollars.

description:
中美高校区块链联盟是一个专注于区块链技术发展和应用的，提供知识学习，信息分享，招聘，创业和投融资对接服务的跨境学生组织。联盟由多位来自于美国知名高校的学生发起，致力于破除信息壁垒，连接中美的区块链爱好者。目前联盟已经吸引了接近两千位有志于在区块链方向上发展的中美学子和工程师加入，覆盖了普林斯顿，斯坦福，伯克利，加州大学洛杉矶分校，耶鲁，清华，北大，浙大，上海交大，北邮等高校，成功举办多场参与人数500+的区块链讲座与活动，积累了大量优质学习资料和业界最新资讯及信息。

The Blockchain Association of College Students is a student organization that focuses on the development and application of blockchain technology. It provides knowledge learning, information sharing, related recruiting, entrepreneurship, investing and financing. The alliance is initiated by students from several prestigious universities in the United States. It is committed to breaking down information barriers and linking the blockchain enthusiasts in both China and the US. Until now, the alliance has attracted nearly 2,000 Chinese students and engineers who are interested in learning and developing blockchain technology and its applications. We have covered the top universities in China and the US(for example Princeton, Stanford, Berkeley, UCLA, Yale, Tsinghua University, Peking University, Zhejiang University, Shanghai Jiaotong University, and Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications). We have successfully hosted several blockchain lectures and activities, each had over 500 participants, which offered us the opportunity to gather a handful of learning materials and latest information in this industry.
name: Blockchain Association of College Students 中美高校区块链联盟

description:
As THTI holdings’ very first incubator out of China, TIPark Silicon Valley welcomes startups from across the world to join us. We started to operate in 2013 in Milpitas, California, the heart of Silicon Valley.

We provide fabulous working space (about 50000 sqft) and incubation services for startups with a very low cost. There are different kinds of office spaces including open desks, cubicles, offices, labs, meeting rooms, event center along with complementary facility use and free font desk services. Virtual office service is available as well.

Our experienced operation team will support and scale up some ambitious startups as well. We focus on frontier technology such as VR/AR, AI, intelligent manufacture and intelligent equipment.
name: 清控科创硅谷孵化器TIPark Silicon Valley

description:
4SeasonsVacations.com invites you to enjoy some of the area's best accommodations, log cabin rentals, mountain chalets and cottages in West Jefferson, Jefferson, Boone and Blowing Rock, North Carolina. 

We offer NC Mountain Vacation Rentals located on the scenic New River, stocked trout streams, at mountain top elevations and in private wooded settings. 

Accommodating Honeymooners - Families - Church Groups - Reunions

Amenities include hot tubs/Jacuzzis, fireplaces, pool tables, ping pong tables, walking trails, covered porches and more...

We are located in Western North Carolina, a short drive from Greensboro and Charlotte. Raleigh/Durham is just three hours away.

You’ll be in the center of the Blue Ridge Mountains close to Boone, Blowing Rock, Todd, West Jefferson and the New River, as well as Virginia destinations such as The Virginia Creeper Trail, Ashe County Cheese and more. 

Take the family to Tweetsie Railroad, Grandfather Mountain or the outdoor drama at Horn in the West.

The Blue Ridge Parkway is accessible at many locations of our county and provides wonderful driving, hiking, biking and picnicking experiences. 

We invite you to view our rental choices and contact us for the vacation getaway of your dreams.



We also offer exclusive BUYER AGENCY so we can assist you in finding your dream home in the mountains or invest in your own vacation rental. Member MLS and Realtor member of NC Association of Realtors. 
If you have any questions or would like more information, please contact us 866-207-4837, 336-246-2700, email us, or use our online request form.
name: "4 Seasons" Vacation Rentals & Sales

柏瑞安投资服务公司总部位于美国夏威夷州檀香山市中心商业区内，是全球领先的专业物业投资（Investment), 旅行 (Outbound Travel) 与生活方式（Lifestyle）管理公司。公司主要针对夏威夷住宅物业市场，为寻求高回报的投资客户和追求高品位生活质量的生活客户提供卓越的服务。我们相信，夏威夷丰富多样的物业类型和柏瑞安无微不至的专业服务一定能满足您的投资和生活需求！

description:
Who We Are

CMIC is a global business advisory firm that provides multidisciplinary solutions to complex challenges and opportunities. With the full power of unique depth of thought combined with the global expertise of leading professionals, we are committed to protecting and enhancing the enterprise value of our clients.

What We Do

Global organizations increasingly face complex challenges created by unpredictable financial markets, ever-changing governmental regulation and increasing global interdependencies. The enterprise value of each organization depends on how well these threats or opportunities are handled. But few have the capability or objective to manage them internally.

CMIC provides the critical external vantage point to maximize the outcomes of these shifting complex scenarios. We help you identify and execute innovative ways to transform complexities into true competitive advantages.

Our Approach

CMIC provides critical thinking to meet critical timelines that produce expected results. Clients retain us because we combine unparalleled expertise with innovative thought leadership to address critical challenges, in both event-driven and long-term scenarios.

Our team of professionals delivers expertise cultivated from tenured experience. Clients rely on undiluted critical thinking that evolves only from decades of hands-on experience at every level. Whether vertical market or cross-discipline, our solutions are firmly grounded, immediate and sustainable.  Because challenges never cease, our engagements often evolve into the role of trusted advisor. Numerous client relationships have endured through the turmoil of business and economic cycles. And many of our new engagements come from existing clients — a testament to our ability to consistently deliver results.

Our Mission

To be the one firm that people turn to worldwide for solutions to issues affecting their business health, well-being, reputations and their lives.
name: Change Management Innovation Company (CMIC)

description:
0 Tolerance Inc. is focused on providing technology and training, promoting literacy and encouraging positive life choices to at-risk youth. 

0TI offers a range of programs designed to establish and expand computer and related skills, begin early professional development and promote positive personal growth.  As technology has become an integral part of the school day, many students lack the resources to have their own equipment in the home.  OTI serves as a facilitator, which provides additional training outside the classroom on computer hardware and software, tablets and other electronics that are standard in most schools and homes.

Our program leaders are professionals dedicated to sharing their proven skills, experiences and advice to participants and clear the path for a solid career and future. 0TI has expanded its programs from basic computing instruction to cover graphic design, web development, leisure reading/writing and internet safety.  Anti-bullying activities, drug prevention education and personal/professional mentoring are also offered.

0 Tolerance Inc. is a 501(c)3 non for profit organization located in Atlanta, GA and Indianapolis, IN.  0 Tolerance (0TI) also operates as Technocation by 0 Tolerance to distinguish itself from a defunct organization with the same name.

description: ZeroIn developed a virtual waiting room web-based platform to help keep patients and staff safe all while being easy to adopt for healthcare offices and patients.  Our virtual waiting room solution sends patients a website link that shows them when they're expected to be seen and allows them to check-in from the parking lot when they have arrived. Once check-in is completed, our site alerts the staff that their patient is on the premises.  Now, patients can wait remotely and enter the appointment once the exam room is ready, eliminating the need for the waiting room and minimizing the risk of patient interaction to increase patient safety. Our technology complements the office workflow, allowing clinic staff to be more efficient and providing safety and clear communication to the patient.
name: ZeroIn
tagline: We replace no-shows with same-days.

description:
OUR SERVICE:

We are NOT a dumpster rental and junk removal company. We are a “Customer Service Company” that happens to rent dumpsters and do full-service junk removal. We are obsessed with making things simple for our customers while providing them the best customer service on the planet. 1-800-JUNKPRO customers can expect easy 24/7 booking, on-time service, friendly uniformed PROs, clean trucks and dumpsters, and up-front rates.


OUR CULTURE:

Our team lives the work hard/play hard mentality, and takes it a step further by combining the two. We hire for a cultural fit and love our family of team members. We make customer and team member happiness our #1 priority, while we build a business that we're proud to involve our family in. Our unusual and exciting culture is driven by our Core Values.


OUR CORE VALUES:

These principles serve as a compass for our actions and describe what customers can expect from our team and what our team members can expect from each other.

1. BE POSITIVE & ACCOUNTABLE
We take ownership. NO EXCUSES! NO BLAME!
We don’t allow negativity, and we know that personal accountability begins with ME!

2. FUN
We have fun while being productive.

3. CUSTOMER OBSESSION
We work wholeheartedly to provide the best customer service on the planet.

4. TEAM
We are team members, not employees.

5. COMMUNICATE WITH INTEGRITY
Communicate good news, bad news, and results, with integrity.

6. LOVE
Love customers, your team, and your work.

7. COMPETITIVE URGENCY
Speed matters in business.

8. LEARN, INNOVATE & SIMPLIFY
Be curious and learn, then use your knowledge to simplify everything.

9. FAMILY
We help each other balance family time and working hard.

10. ACCOMPLISH MORE WITH LESS
Constraints breed resourcefulness, self-sufficiency, and innovation.

11. SHARE THE FRUIT
We win together. We lose together.

12. BE HUMBLE
Being humble doesn’t mean you think less of yourself, it means you think of yourself less.
specialties: The Best Customer Service On The Planet
name: 1-800-JUNKPRO

description:
153 Group assists companies by creating operational efficiencies through capturing all essential team tasks that focus on accomplishing the company’s mission and eliminating tasks that do not. 153 Group then takes these essential tasks and combines them with more details to build out step-by-step procedures with any existing programs, i.e.: Client Management Systems or Operations Manuals, in order to create guidelines and establish skillset overlaps. This allows team members from top to bottom to virtually eliminate the stress of not knowing what is expected from each of them and how it all impacts the accomplishment of the company’s mission.

153 Group will assist with the establishment or restructuring of weekly team meetings that will focus on all active tasks in the company pipeline and who may need assistance with any of the tasks in order to move the process forward. By combining the new processes and Operations Manuals with the team meeting format, the company will have a system in place for all team members to be held accountable by each other as well as a way to identify possible issues and team members that can assist. All of this with the ultimate goal in mind of meeting and exceeding the company’s mission.

-Get free valet parking for events

-Attend 4 quarterly lunches, happy hours, and more

-Get to vote for the winning charity

As a member of 100 Men of Dane County, you have a voice and a vote in how we can support charities to help bring our youth from Survival, to Success, to Significance. Each quarter, the top 3 charities/organizations that make it through the executive board process are then asked to prepare a video. Once the board receives them all, we will send them off to all members to review and vote. Voting will be open all week once you receive the email to review and vote. This way you can decide for yourself which charity should win!

100% of the money raised goes to the charity! With the support of our generous sponsors and donated time by the executive board, the 100 Men of Dane County are able to donate all of the money raised.
name: 100 Men of Dane County
tagline: Bring our youth from Survival, to Success, to Significance.

description: 100 Resilient Cities - Pioneered by the Rockefeller Foundation (100RC) is dedicated to helping cities around the world become more resilient to the physical, social and economic challenges that are a growing part of the 21st century.   100RC supports the adoption and incorporation of a view of resilience that includes not just the shocks – earthquakes, fires, floods, etc – but also the stresses that weaken the fabric of a city on a day to day or cyclical basis.  Examples of these stresses include high unemployment; an overtaxed or inefficient public transportation system; endemic violence; or chronic food and water shortages.  By addressing both the shocks and the stresses, a city becomes more able to respond to adverse events, and is overall better able to deliver basic functions in both good times and bad, to all populations.  Cities in the 100RC network are provided with the resources along four main pathways: 1) Financial and logistical guidance for establishing an innovative new position in city government, a Chief Resilience Officer, who will lead the city’s resilience efforts; 2) Expert support for development of a robust resilience building strategy; 3) Access to solutions, service providers, and partners from the private, public and NGO sectors who can help them develop and implement their resilience strategies; and 4) Membership in a global network of member cities who can learn from and help each other. Through these offerings, 100RC aims not only help individual cities become more resilient, but to facilitate the creation of a global practice of resilience building.100 Resilient Cities is financially supported by The Rockefeller Foundation and managed as a sponsored project by Rockefeller Philanthropy Advisors (RPA), an independent 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization that provides governance and operational infrastructure to its sponsored projects.
name: 100 Resilient Cities - Pioneered by the Rockefeller Foundation
tagline: Legacy account of 100RC program (ended July 2019) Resilient Cities Network carries on the work| Follow @RCitiesNetwork

description:
Imagine 100 days playing 100 different golf courses as you travel across the country.  It is every golfer’s dream…or nightmare.  Starting March of 2019 in San Diego and ending in Boston on June 19th, The Longest Day, that is what I will be undertaking…for a very good cause.  To raise awareness and money for the Alzheimer’s Association, I will travel across the country, playing golf at 100 different courses in 100 days with celebrities, golf pros, regular golfers (all skill levels are welcome).  I will be playing with anyone who can help the cause.

Alzheimer’s impacts 6 million Americans and 1 in 3 seniors.  It is a devastating disease not only for the patients but for their caregivers who are often family members.  Almost everyone knows someone who has been affected by this devastating disease.

Working with local partners and national sponsors to talk about this disease we expect to reach over 100,000 people every day.  Partner and sponsors social media platforms, web sites and email marketing platforms will help publicize the events and generate significant local and national media attention.  Our goal is to raise over $1,000,000 for research and care.

I will be playing everyday;  rain, wind, heat, or whatever comes my way, if the course is open I am playing.  I will play a course or two in each city and then hit the road to find the next course.  I am looking to find foursomes and tournaments that will bring people together to raise awareness of Alzheimer’s and get the word out.  We will be joined by celebrities, sports stars, and local heroes to have some fun on the course.
name: 100 Days 100 Courses - Drive for Alzheimer's

description:
100 Women Strong is a giving circle dedicated to improving the lives of women and children in our community. 

As a giving circle, we pool our membership dues in a unique collaborative approach that has a multiplier effect on our grant-making. We are women-led and outcome-focused, and our collective power allows us to identify root causes and fund innovative solutions with our community partners.

Each member makes an annual tax-deductible gift of $1,100 to a pooled fund. We research and identify and vote on where the grants will go in the community to make an impact. Since 2006, 100 Women Strong has invested more than $725,000 in local initiatives to improve the lives of women and children. 

100 Women Strong is a volunteer-led part of Central Florida Foundation’s Women in Philanthropy initiative. For more information, please visit cffound.org/100_women_strong.
name: 100 Women Strong, A Giving Circle at Central Florida Foundation
tagline: Improving the lives of women and children through collective giving.

description: The Atlanta-based entrepreneurial team behind 101 Concepts relies on the dynamic combination of friendship and shared worked ethic for their successful partnership. The group came together through their Brooklyn backgrounds – meeting as busboys at a New York restaurant and as roommates at Iona College. Luckily for diners in the Southeast, those shared experiences led them to find their niche in friendly, neighborhood restaurants and pubs in Atlanta and Rosemary Beach, Florida. Steve Buero and Chris Segal opened SOHO in September 1997 and showed a knack for bringing the right concept to the right area. Next, the partners, along with Phil Roness, went Irish with Meehan’s Public House in October 2002. There are now five Meehan’s locations throughout Metro Atlanta (Vinings, Downtown, Sandy Springs, Buckhead and Atlantic Station). After opening Sandy Springs staples Cibo e Beve and Food 101 and Castleberry Hill barbecue joint Smoke Ring, the crew decided to take their hospitality to the beach, obtaining Rosemary Beach’s Restaurant Paradis in 2014. In spring 2016, their dreams of owning a steakhouse finally came true with the opening of 101 Steak in Vinings. Don't be fooled by the name, although the "101" restaurants are indeed approachable, they are far from basic.
name: 101 Concepts Restaurant Group

UNLEASHING THE ENTREPRENEURIAL SPIRIT

There are companies that exist to sell a better mousetrap. They work to improve the systems and processes. They try to out-market the competition.

Then, there are companies that invent. They create products that did not before exist. They introduce existing products into new markets. They start from an idea and build from the ground up.

1020 Partners was founded to help the companies that can see a product or a market that has not yet been built.

"Real Men Giving Real Time"

The 100 Black Men of Jacksonville, Inc., the Jacksonville Chapter of the 100 Black Men of America, Inc., was founded in September 1991 under the principal that Black Men can make a positive impact on the young Black males in our community of Jacksonville. The chapter set out to engage in those activities that would improve the rate of success for our young Black males by encouraging and inspiring them to recognize the importance of a quality education as the spring board to becoming productive members of society.

The Jacksonville chapter is a non-profit corporation organized under the laws, rules and regulations of the state of Florida. We are a group of Black men who volunteer their time and talents to provide training and mentorship programs for the youth. The chapter seeks, provides and acts to facilitate the process of educational, economic and social mobility to improve the quality of life for African American males as they transition from boyhood to manhood.

Please join us as we engage in a "Partnership for Positive Change."
name: 100 Black Men Of Jacksonville

“101 Things to Do” magazines originated in the Hawaiian Islands in 1995. We now publish in over 20 markets, all of them free to the public.

We offer valuable information to visitors and locals alike, such as delicious places to dine, unique sites to visit, engaging family activities, and adventures galore.

As a quarterly publication we feature the very best activities for every season. Our magazine also contains coupons for our readers and detailed maps to help guide your adventure throughout the beautiful county of San Diego.

Planning a vacation is easy with the help of “101 Things to Do San Diego.” Whether you are with the family, on a trip alone, or a local who simply wants to try something new, we have the activity for you. From beaches and shopping, to dining and entertainment, we highlight the best activities on the coast, inland, and even on the islands.

We distribute 25,000 magazines monthly throughout San Diego County in hotels, attractions, car rental agencies, restaurants, newsstands, visitor information centers and both terminals at Lindbergh field, so there is always a guide near you. 

We hope that you enjoy San Diego’s essential guide to everything, and if you have any ideas, comments, or feedback, please don’t hesitate to contact us.

description:
Over the last decade, a major shift has taken place in the real estate world. The internet has completely changed how consumers can buy and sell homes, and that’s a good thing. In years past, buyers and sellers did not have nearly enough information accessible to them as they do today. But somehow, the way real estate is being transacted and the fees charged have not fully caught up to it.

We understand that the digital age has changed the real estate world, and with that - realtor fees should be adjusted to help the consumer. Our company’s goal is to serve the greater Chicago area with a full-service real estate brokerage that can utilize today’s modern technology, offer streamlined digital processes, all while helping sellers and buyers save thousands of dollars on real estate fees.

description:
We are a locally operated independent community bank. We take great pride in carrying on the rich heritage and traditions of the region by providing real support to the community, through our world class financial services and employees' volunteerism. 1880 Bank has served Dorchester County and the Eastern Shore of Maryland for over 130 years. Originally known as The National Bank of Cambridge, 1880 Bank is stronger than ever as the result of its dedicated team of banking executives who have guided the institution toward a positive financial future. The bank has six conveniently located branch offices on Maryland’s Eastern Shore and now serves Delaware through online banking services.

“Our new name reflects our local Dorchester County roots but also gives us the flexibility to grow and expand elsewhere on the Shore,” said Kim C. Liddell, Chairman, President and CEO of Delmarva Bancshares, Inc. and 1880 Bank. “In the past four years, we have grown deeper relationships with businesses and individuals in Caroline, Cecil, Kent, Queen Anne’s, Talbot and Wicomico counties, and we believe there is an opportunity for further growth throughout the Delmarva Peninsula.”

Our success is driven by the local team of employees who deliver professional, hometown service and who provide a strong, safe and sound bank for you to do business with in person or online. We are committed to helping our community preserve its wonderful history and our top priority will always be to offer the best services available safely and securely to the businesses and citizens of the communities we serve.
name: 1880 Bank
tagline: Proudly Serving the Eastern Shore for over 138 years!

description:
OUR PASSION: As part of an honored tradition, upon returning from battle, Marine units always conduct a formal memorial service at Camp Pendleton for their fallen brothers and sisters and for their families. This is the fulfillment of the Marine promise that "no one is left behind and no one is forgotten."  These services, held at the unit's home location, are both beautiful and heartbreaking. These locations become a very special place of remembrance and reflection for the Marines and their families and provide a tranquil setting to gather together, to grieve and to commemorate the loss of their loved ones. In recognition of the service and sacrifice of the 11th Marine Regiment, we want to establish a special place at Las Pulgas specifically designed to honor the proud history of these Marines and Sailors and to serve as a special place of reflection and celebration.
OUR PURPOSE: To organize and work together with a team to raise donations that will support the construction of a “Ceremonial Garden” area at Camp Las Pulgas aboard Camp Pendleton. This garden will be located between the chapel and Fiddler's Green at Las Pulgas and it will be a serene place to recognize and honor the Marines and Sailors of 11th Marines along with the Regiment's proud history. It will be a quiet venue for veterans, families, and friends to gather and remember their Marines and Sailors, especially those who have given the ultimate sacrifice in past combat. The Ceremonial Garden will also serve as a celebratory site for promotions, award ceremonies, re-enlistments, and retirements, as well as a special place to honor all of our Cannon Cocker veterans.  Our concept includes a two-tiered plaza large enough for formations, visitors, unit emblems and signage to commemorate our veterans and the battles they fought.
Neither the United States Marine Corps nor any other component of the Department of Defense has approved, endorsed, or authorized the 11th Marines Ceremonial Garden organization.
name: 11th Marines Ceremonial Garden

description:
The 13-24 Drive In is one of only 330 drive-in movie theaters still operating in the United States. Located in Wabash, Indiana, the theater is both a relic of the past and a modern form of entertainment. Thousands of visitors turn into the 13-24 Drive In each summer to enjoy new blockbusters and retro reels.

The theater opened in 1951 and has captured the hearts of locals and tourists alike for nearly 70 years. Though much has changed in cinema and automobiles since the theater was founded, a few things remain the same. The facility still features the original ticket booth and concession stand. The 13-24 Drive In still stands on the same 17 acres it was developed on. And on certain nights, you can still catch old classics like The Wizard of Oz or Top Gun.

Open seasonally from May to September, the 13-24 Drive In offers free admission to kids 12 and under, compliments of INGUARD. Over 50,000 kids and counting have seen films for free. In 2010, longtime supporters of The Honeywell Foundation, Michael and Angie Beauchamp and Parker and Katie Beauchamp, purchased the Drive In with the intent of the Honeywell Foundation operating the facility and receiving all the proceeds.
name: 13-24 Drive In
tagline: The historic drive-in movie theater located in Wabash, Indiana.

description:
10th Avenue Tea is an all-natural instant tea powder. It's as simple as shake, pour and drink! Each 2-oz recyclable bottle holds 45 servings or more depending on how strong you make your tea. Most of our teas are matcha-based, and they all dissolve instantly in hot or iced water!

Our Chicago and LA-based company was founded by two tea-loving, tree-hugging, entrepreneurial moms. We realized that billions of tea bags and plastic, quick-brew cups go into landfills each year. This image of waste and environmental doom was what lingered in the back of our minds every time we made a cup of tea.

And it suddenly became clear: we had to do something about it. Why can’t we make a delicious tea that won’t harm the environment? Why can’t we marry convenience with a green mindset?

That’s when 10th Avenue Tea was born. After extensive product development, we found an innovative way to achieve those goals in the form of our U.S. patent-pending product.  Though we were advised to do otherwise, we held firm to our beliefs and developed a tea powder that is free of sugars, fillers and preservatives. When we found a metal shaker bottle that allowed customers to make the tea to their desired strength and was easily recycled, we knew we had the answers we were searching for.
name: 10th Avenue Tea

description:
110X CEO – The Program
10X is the accelerated learning environment for high performing venture backed CEOs nominated by Silicon Valley’s top venture firms.

10X CEO Program – Qualifications
Must be nominated by a top tier Silicon Valley venture firm or a current 10X Member CEO.
Is currently leading a company with $5 – $500 million in annual revenue and rapid growth rates (usually +50%).
Must demonstrate the ability, desire, focus, and courage to function at a 10X level.  They are willing and able to lever up their own contribution, and be the chief learning officer for their organization.

10X CEO – THE PROGRAM
10X CEOs analyze their game like a professional athlete, focus on the right few priorities, and execute their highest value priorities at an accelerated rate.

Expected Outcomes for 10X CEOs
Time is the primary constraint for venture backed CEOs.  10X CEOs focus their time more effectively, and use accelerated learning to execute faster and better.
10X CEOs achieve 10X financial outcomes when compared with other “post series A” venture backed CEOs.  That puts 10X CEOs in the 96th percentile of their venture-backed peers.
10X CEOs achieve venture like (greater than 10X) return on their fees and time invested in the program each year.
name: 10X CEO
tagline: 10X is the accelerated learning environment for high performing venture backed CEOs.

description:
10ZiG Technology is a world market leader in the field of endpoints for Desktop Virtualization. Focused solely on the development of Thin and Zero Clients for the latest desktop environments, 10ZiG has long-standing partnerships with industry leaders such as VMware, Citrix and Microsoft that allow for support of the latest VDI protocols, such as Blast Extreme, PCoIP and HDX.

Headquartered in Phoenix, Arizona, with U.S. based Sales and Technical Support, 10ZiG also has offices in the UK, Germany and Asia Pacific; affording it a worldwide reach in the Thin and Zero Client marketplace. 10ZiG offers cutting-edge dual through quad-screen Thin and Zero Clients with in-demand feature sets including fiber/SFP ready, PoE, Wireless and a combination of DVI, DisplayPort and/or HDMI port options.  

Our endpoint management software, The 10ZiG Manager™, comes FREE and works with any endpoint running on a 10ZiG OS - including x86 devices to laptops, tablets or third-party Thin Clients. Connect via LAN/WAN or the Cloud and manage large volumes of endpoints located remotely in cities across the country – or anywhere in the world.

For more information, please call US: (866) 865-5250, EMEA: +44 (0) 116 214 8660,  web: www.10ZiG.com or email: US: info@10ZiG.com EMEA: info@10ZiG.eu

updates.text: This is a big day for 11 Honoré! Today we launched our partnership with Nordstrom, releasing our Fall 2021 drop of the 11 Honoré Collection designed by Danielle Williams Eke in five stores and online. We are so honored to have them share in our vision for inclusivity. Thank you so much to Patrick Herning and our entire team for their hard work!
Thank you Business Insider and Madeline Stone for featuring 11 Honoré as one of the fastest-growing DTC brands! https://lnkd.in/gSgrtFB
Another beautiful feature about our initiative! Thank you Virgie Tovar & Forbes!https://lnkd.in/gWJWpwh
Thank you The Business of Fashion and Joan Kennedy for this feature on our exciting new launch! https://lnkd.in/gpfncBD

11 Honoré is thrilled to announce an exciting new initiative with BIPOC designers in collaboration with 11 Honoré Design Director Danielle Williams Eke. The initiative partners her with established BIPOC designers and uses 11 Honoré as a platform to help them launch into extended sizing while amplifying their voices in the fashion industry. Kicking off this partnership are LaQuan Smith and Greta Constantine, both successful and celebrated designers, who worked with Danielle and the 11 Honoré team for months to perfect the fit and sizing and to guarantee the initiative was thoughtful every step of the way. Both designers imbued their expertise and artistic vision into each beautifully constructed garment with Danielle acting as the fit model, resulting in stunning collections expertly tailored to fit a wider range of body types. ⁠⁠“As Design Director for 11 Honoré not only is it my responsibility to design for plus size women, who are often ignored in this industry, but as a Black designer it is important that I am a part of ushering other Black designers into the plus space. Black designers and creatives have been overlooked and underrepresented in the fashion industry for far too long, so needless to say this initiative is very close to my heart.” - Danielle Williams-Eke https://lnkd.in/gEShRbu

Our Design Director Danielle Williams Eke is making waves in fashion! Thank you CreateCultivate for featuring her op-ed about the future of fashion and the goal to make inclusivity and diversity standard within the industry. 🖤⁠⁠Link below to read the full feature. https://lnkd.in/g7VyJqb

description:
We are a 501c3 not for profit that rescues horses from terrible situations of abuse and neglect.   After a 30 day quarantine, the horses arrive at our farm frightened, underweight and anxious. They require a lot of TLC and attention to bring them back to health.  They are assessed, cared for and nurtured. Our goal is to re-home them with the perfect owner.  We have a strenuous adoption review process to ensure that the right match is made and the horse will live out the rest of their life free from fear and abuse. 

Some horses are selected for our Equine Assisted Therapy program which follows the EAGALA model (no riding).  EAP is an established and proven method of therapy. We focus on Veterans and children and there are many conditions which can be helped through this method.
name: 13 Hands Equine Rescue
tagline: A voice for the voiceless

description:
As confirmed by key opinion leaders, there is no technology that allows for continuous monitoring of brain hemodynamics (blood flow and metabolism). This is particularly crucial in the neonatal ICU, where long term negative outcomes such as cerebral palsy and intellectual disability are driven by injuries to the brain due to the immature cardiovascular system and under-/over-treatment. 
Our device is the first non-invasive monitor that measures real-time brain hemodynamics and metabolism, second by second. It provides early actionable alerts and continuous feedback allowing for early intervention and treatment monitoring.
name: 149 Medical Inc
tagline: Deliver inexpensive, non-invasive tools to help treat critical conditions

description:
We're a national nonprofit organization supporting the health and well-being of men who have had unwanted or abusive sexual experiences. We also serve family members, friends, and partners of male survivors.

Researchers estimate that at least 1 in 6 men have been sexually abused or assaulted.

As it stands, there are limited resources available that speak to the unique challenges faced by men who have been sexually abused or assaulted, such as ingrained myths about manhood, and the social stigma and silence around the issue, which results in a lack of awareness. This means that many men repress their trauma and delay recovery, risking exposure to physical health issues, mental health issues, and social dysfunction.

We offer a wealth of information related to the effects of and recovery from men's experiences with sexual trauma. Men, friends, and family can chat anonymously with a trained advocate through our national helpline, available 24/7. We also offer weekly online support groups for male survivors, facilitated by a counselor. Our multimedia awareness campaign features portraits and stories of a community of male survivors—aimed at breaking through the isolation, silence, and stigma often connected with the issue. Based in Los Angeles, we also conduct trainings for professionals, organizations, and military branches around the world.

When men heal, not only are they able to live happier, healthier lives, but the people around them—including their families, friends, coworkers, and communities—benefit as well. In addition, we believe that men have a responsibility to engage in the movement to end sexual violence of all kinds, and that they will be more likely to do so if their experiences are acknowledged and their healing is supported alongside their bystander efforts.

For more information and/or support, please visit www.1in6.org.
name: 1in6
tagline: The mission of 1in6 is to help men who have had unwanted or abusive sexual experiences live healthier, happier lives.

updates.text: O Relatório Mundial de Alzheimer, entregue pela AID - Alzheimer's Disease International em 21 de Setembro desse ano, veio iluminar os sinais de alerta da demência, incentivando pessoas a procurarem informações, aconselhamento e apoio com os órgãos competentes do seu país.Um dos dados do relatório é alarmante: 75% dos pacientes com demência, o equivalente a 41 milhões de pessoas, não receberam diagnóstico da patologia. Por outro lado, o mesmo relatório trouxe recomendações que podem auxiliar para que esse número diminua, como a introdução de check-ups anuais da saúde do cérebro para pessoas com mais de 50 anos, com a oportunidade de promover estratégias de redução de risco. Além disso, o registro de diagnósticos com mais precisão deve ser uma busca dos governos em todo o mundo, assim como o de se prepararem para um aumento da demanda por serviços de saúde como resultado do envelhecimento da população global.A medição das taxas de diagnóstico é a chave para o tratamento, cuidado e apoio, para a preparação do sistema de saúde e para desafiar o estigma. Por isso, diagnósticos aprimorados e tratamentos farmacológicos emergentes são imprescindíveis! Segundo a AID "É apenas através de um esforço verdadeiramente global que podemos aumentar a tão necessária conscientização e desafiar o estigma e a desinformação que ainda envolve a demência." Milenar e sustentável, o Cânhamo é uma das matérias-primas mais versáteis da indústria.Ainda muito confundido com outra planta da mesma espécie cannabis, as pesquisas disponíveis permitem a conclusão de que o cruzamento seletivo resultou em duas cepas diferentes. O Cânhamo é uma variação genética com características diferentes e possui baixíssimo teor do psicoativo Tetrahidrocanabidiol (THC). Em muitos países, as concentrações dessas substâncias são fixadas por lei, o que estimula o cultivo de linhagens com baixo nível ou mesmo com a total remoção dessa substância das plantas.O mais interessante é que o Cânhamo pode ser cultivado em qualquer solo e não necessita de pesticidas para prosperar, além disso, requer 20% menos água que a cultura do algodão, por exemplo.O Cânhamo é utilizado para a fabricação de alimentos e ingredientes alimentícios. Além disso, é matéria prima para produtos cosméticos, suplementos nutricionais e terapêuticos; tecidos e materiais têxteis. Também pode ser utilizado em diferentes produtos industriais e manufaturados, substituindo cimento, fibra de vidro. Conhecida por sua resistência e durabilidade, a fibra do Cânhamo é produzida a partir do caule, é uma alternativa economicamente competitiva e ambientalmente sustentável.O cânhamo é cultivado conforme o uso pretendido da colheita: das folhas e flores, extraímos os compostos químicos que possuem propriedades medicinais; os canabinóides. Ou seja, o Cânhamo é a matéria prima do 1Pure® Canabidiol Premium! description:
2-Way Communications, LLC offers license agreements for leadership curriculum. We offer over 20 leadership courses. We are instantly ready to meet your leadership training needs.  

With a license agreement, you obtain the rights to unlimited duplication and customization of the materials. Each license agreement comes with electronic files for the participant guide, instructor guide, and handouts. For two of our courses, Delegation and Be a THINKing Partner, we have an app that complements the content and extends the learning. 

Our leadership courses are interaction and application based.  Every course includes practicing the skills taught using the participants' work situations. 

2-Way will support customizing the materials and training your trainers.  We offer design services and train-the-trainer courses. 

2-Way Communications, LLC courses were designed by Diane Morrison, the owner, using formal instructional design principles and by integrating over 20 years of leadership experience. Each course is designed on research-based leadership principles. 

Diane Morrison started 2-Way in 1999.  She has taught over 15,000 leaders in over 50 companies. Diane has designed over 500 courses that have been taught internationally. Her dedication to leadership development is what drives her to develop leadership training that makes a difference. 

You can review the curriculum outlines and app description by going to 2waycommunications.net. 

Course outlines include: 
• Accountability 
• Be a THINKing Partner 
• Career Development 
• Communicate with Clarity 
• Conflict Management 
• Delegation 
• Emotional Intelligence 
• Feedback 
• Hiring 
• Personal Leadership & Influence 
• Leading Meetings 
• Mentoring 
• Performance Management 
• Quarterly Conversations 
• Presentation Skills 
• Problem Solving 
• Stress Management 
• Time Management
• Unconscious Bias 
• Unlocking Innovative Thinking
name: 2-Way Communications, LLC

updates.text: We are pleased to share that in conjunction with the recent 20-20 Services LLC & Write To Excite webinar delivered by Ryan Standil, 20-20 was proud to make a donation in the amount of $800 to The Breast Cancer Research Foundation. In honor of #breastcancerawarenessmonth we are hopeful that with further research all of those who hear the words “you have breast cancer“ will go on to live long, full and cancer free lives. Breast cancer is the most commonly diagnosed cancer, worldwide.   Thank you to all of you who attended the webinar! #breastcancer #breastcancerresearch

*New Client Opportunity* If your firm has never worked with 20-20 Services LLC, we would welcome the opportunity to see your professionals in our virtual classrooms! You and a guest are invited to join 20-20 on Wednesday, October 20th at 3pmET for a two CPE credit webinar on Clarity in Business Writing. There is no charge to attend this webinar. 20-20 has partnered with Write To Excite and we are thrilled to have its founder, Ryan Standil, present this dynamic session. In honor of “Breast Cancer Awareness Month“, 20-20 will donate $10 for each person who attends the event to The Breast Cancer Research Foundation (BCRF), which is an independent, not-for-profit organization that has raised $569.4 million to support clinical and translational research on breast cancer at medical institutions in the United States and abroad. BCRF currently funds over 275 researchers in 15 countries.  Please click on the link below to register and secure your seat. description:
We create professionally designed products that deliver your message, enhance your image and protect your brand.

We’re talented designers and organized project managers. We’re flexible. We’re creative (but we’re not design divas!) We are always open to our client’s suggestions. We love working as an in-house design team for organizations that need, but don’t have, an on-call team. We meet our deadlines. And we stay on budget.

We think that’s all just good basic business and deliver that to our clients every day.

One of our primary competitive differences is that we are an agile and responsive design firm, consisting of two principal designers and an industry-seasoned production manager. With very low overhead and a streamlined project management structure, our responsiveness to your needs will be swift and personal. We are respectful of established brands (and those who uphold them!) and we are easy-going enough to blend in seamlessly with your team to help out in crunch times.

We work collaboratively with our clients to accomplish their goals. We understand that there are often multiple reviewers for each publication and are happy to work with the consolidated comments and instructions from a team. We ask that each project or publication have a designated staff member as our point of contact.
name: 202design

Accepting, Exciting and Real
At 24-Seven, we strive to love first, accept diversity, and build community around each other. We seek to create a safe environment for those who have left, given up or are just bored with church. We follow Jesus and His teachings. We come to search God together, ask the tough questions and explore how the Bible actually applies to our lives. We encourage our congregation to speak their minds, look for answers and move towards building a strong faith in Christ.

Worship
At 24-Seven we play music that speaks to us. Our band members and worship leaders are a wonderful group of musicians from various backgrounds that come together to use their talents for God -- from Contemporary Christian and Jazz to Blues and the occasional new rendition of a good old favorite hymn. Our church service is "come as you are" -- if you like dressing up.... cool.  If not, we are okay with that too. Tuxedo t-shirts are a good compromise.

Community
At 24-Seven, community is extremely important to us. We come from all over western Washington, and in order to stay connected we work to build community around each other. The church is a body and we don't want to miss any limbs.
name: 24-Seven Ministry Center

Meet our newest Designer, Andrew S, who we've come to find is a really big fan of puns and also hanging out inside of lockers. How fun! Q:  Where are you from? 🌴A:  I’m a native South Floridian. An authentic Florida Man, if you will.Q:  What is your favorite trip? ✈️A:  In 2019, I channeled my inner Nathan Drake and took off on a 9-month solo backpacking trip around the world. I was fortunate enough to wander my way through Ireland, England, Scotland, Italy, Germany, Spain, Morocco, and Thailand before coming home to escape the COVID border closures. If I had to choose a specific adventure from that trip, I’d go with either driving the North Coast 500 in the Scottish Highlands or living the island life on Ko Tao, Thailand.Q:  What's your go-to karaoke song? 🎤A:  Rockstar by Smash Mouth all day.Q:  What are your hobbies? 🕺🏻A:  I’m a bit all over the place when it comes to my hobbies. In no particular order: photography, reading, D&D, scuba diving, rock climbing, gaming, disc golf, and dad jokes.

Waiting for you, I've been waiting so long for you.... then I gave up...If we could write a song about customer support's app it would be long, and it ends badly.😫If the company ask the customer to download the app to communicate with the company..., well... Do you hate the customers!? 😰 😡 Over 90% of us get frustrated when a business requires an app download to communicate. Make it as simple as possible. The user experience is crucial to make the customer come back. What is more, they need support right here, right now. #textmessage #communication #businessapp

86% of small business owners who utilize text messaging say texting offers higher engagement than email communication. Why do so❓📱 The answer is simple- people say that they are checking, sending, and answering text messages is the activity that they’re most engaged with on their phones throughout the day.📱 Thus, SMS campaigns vastly increase the likelihood your marketing efforts will be seen. Not only that, text message marketing is permission-based, so consumers opt into campaigns, allowing them to make a significant jump down the sales funnel. 📱 But also they could start the conversation with you as the company. ❗️ Remember that nowadays people prefer to have contact with people, not chatbots. #textmessage #marketingsms #marketingcampaigns

Those SMS facts showcase how effective this form of advertising and communication can be. If you want to connect to customers, business text messaging is the most direct avenue. Customers say a clean and easy opt-out method is the most important thing to them when receiving SMS marketing messages.😎📱 Looking to reach a younger audience with your message. There is no better channel, 42% of Millennials check their text messages 10 or more times per day on average.📱 Millennials aren’t the only ones who are phone-obsessed – consumers over 60 check their phones three or more times per hour.📱 Does it matter to customers who (or what) is on the other side of the SMS message? Maybe. 74% of consumers said they still prefer to get help from a human rather than interacting solely with a chatbot.#businessSMS #statistics #millennials

According to McKinsey “Like almost all functions in essentially every sector, the shift to remote selling was born of necessity, as lockdowns, shelter-in-place orders, and quarantines forced people to stay at home. Not surprisingly, the trend of switching to phone is more pronounced in some sectors than in others: in technology, media, and telecoms, it is nearly 100 percent.”The trend will develop as we noticed that meeting face to face is not always essential. The lockdown caused that many of us are inseparable from our phones. Dropping the text message to our customer is not a bad idea. #communication #sells #textmessages

The respondents indicate an increase in the number of SMS received with commercial information. 👇🏻📱 The interest in such a form of communication from brands and stores is constantly growing. Nevertheless, more than 30% of respondents agree that it should not be more often than a few times a week.📱 The majority of respondents declare that they could visit an online or stationery store after receiving an SMS from a specific brand. 📱 Most attractive in the opinion of the respondents is information about promotions, discounts and favorable offers.#textmessage #customersatisfaction #communicationwithcustomer

We are extremely happy when you share with us your opinion about 2way.app. Why is it important? You could check below👇🏻👇🏻Top performing companies understand an important role that customer feedback plays in business. They consistently listen to the voice of their clients. Not only they search for opinions their clients publish on social media and reviews they provide on websites designed for gathering feedback, but they also deliberately ask for feedback using distinct kinds of surveys. If you want to stay ahead of the competition you should never stop listening to customer feedback whether it is positive or negative, prompted or unprompted.Why the customer's opinion is so important?📱 Helps improve products and services;📱 Helps you measure customer satisfaction;📱 Shows you value their opinions;📱 Helps you create the best customer experience;📱 Helps to improve customer retention;📱 The reliable source for information to other consumers;📱 Gives you data that helps to take business decisions.#customersatisfaction #CX #textmessage

description:
Our specialty at 1st Fruits Consulting is to help companies hire people who are the right fit to their organization. Utilizing various sources to identify potential candidates, we screen people for a philosophical alignment with your organization using both historical and behavioral screening methods.

Our recruiting process can be applied to any industry and we work with clients in healthcare, engineering, higher education, construction, banking, accounting, non-profits, and more. Our services are scalable to any size business.

CHECK OUT OUR JOB BOARD:
http://jobs.crelate.com/portal/1stfruitsconsulting

RECRUITING:
Do you have a sensitive position that requires the right person?

Are you trying to fill a call center or have a high volume of positions to fill?

The process used by 1st Fruits Consulting is scalable for any number of positions and is appropriate for all levels in your organization. Every position is important to the effective funtioning of an organization, and the better they all mesh together, the more efficient the team.

Recruiting can be based on a retained, contract, or contingency basis and each search is based on the specific needs of the client.

CONSULTING:
Do you have a short term need or require some expertise in your human resources or employment department?

1st Fruits Consulting is available for projects of a few hours to many months. We have a group of Associates with specific talents to help on various projects for our clients specific needs.

SEMINARS:
1st Fruits Consulting is available to help train your staff or provide knowledge for job seekers for various groups. A sample of some of our sessions include:

-Profiles in Employment: Who am I Really Hiring?
-Sourcing Strategies for Recruiters
-Tell Me About a Time When... Your Interviews Were Successful! Behavioral Based Interviewing Skills.

-Job Searching Strategies

Contact us today to discuss how we can work with your organization.

After years of working with a national real estate franchise,  we form our this brokerage firm, 1st Michigan Realty.

We determined that by going independent, we could become more flexible, effective and responsive to our customer’s needs. Affiliation/Franchising might provide some benefits for the real estate agent, such as brand recognition, but it actually does not provide much value to help our customer – YOU, in many cases, costing you more.  Most of them are independent owned like us. Therefore, Home buyers and sellers shouldn’t need to care whose name is on the yard sign, you just want a positive experience, value and results. We offer elite service and exceptional results. Most agents join the team because of the good experiences as a client and wants to pass on the those positive experience to our customers.

1st Michigan believes that Real estate is not about us but you and the community. giving back to my communities have not only been great experiences for us, but have given us an edge professionally.  our commitment to supporting the local communities and charity organizations not only strengthens our neighborhoods by helping those in need, it keeps us in touch with other industry leaders and trends that can affect the real estate market.

1st Michigan Realty is a member of National Realtor Association (NAR) and Michigan Realtor Association (MAR).
specialties: Real Estate Professionals and Specialized in buy/sell/lease Residential Properties
name: 1st Michigan Realty LLC

Welcome to the official 1st Theater Sustainment Command LinkedIn page where you will find news coverage, videos and photos highlighting our Service members around the globe.

The 1st Theater Sustainment Command provides mission command and operational-level sustainment support to Army, Joint, Interagency, and Multinational Forces; sets the theater; and conducts theater security cooperation within the U.S. Central Command (USCENTCOM) area of responsibility in order to enable unified land operations in support of Combatant Commander directives.

For information about U.S. Army career opportunities, visit https://www.usajobs.gov/ or http://www.goarmy.com

While we aim to provide an open, interactive space for all, we ask that you share your opinions and feedback in a respectful manner. As a fan of our page, you take personal responsibility for your comments, your username, and any information you submit. In that spirit, users are asked to adhere to the guidelines below to ensure that our page. Violation of any of these guidelines may result in your comment being removed:

- We do not allow graphic, obscene, explicit, racist, or sexist comments under any circumstances.
- We do not allow comments that are abusive, hateful or slanderous to any person, organization, or nation.
- We do not allow comments that suggest, endorse, or encourage illegal activity.
- We do not allow any sort of solicitation or advertisement, including endorsement of any commercial, financial, or non-governmental organization.

Additionally, the appearance of external links, as posted by fans of this page or other LinkedIn users, does not constitute endorsement on behalf of the U.S. Army or the Department of Defense.

description:
Based in the Norfolk area, 1 Stop Driving School, LLC was created to play a role in improving the safety and reducing accidents involving the Virginia motoring public. We are committed to providing the highest quality, up-to-date driver improvement course curriculum available.  We offer only Virginia Department of Motor Vehicle (DMV) approved classroom and online driver improvement curriculum. All of our instructors are licensed by the Virginia DMV. Our goal is to instill a heightened awareness regarding motor vehicle safety and impress upon our students that safety is a responsibility shared by all drivers. 
In addition to teaching the 8-hour Driver Improvement Course, we are certified to teach, Behind-the-Wheel, Driver’s Training Manual Course, 3 Times Failure Certification, Commercial Driver Licenses (CDL), Juvenile + Adult Classroom Training, Escort Vehicle Driver Certification Training, and Fleet training personnel. We teach in Norfolk, Chesapeake, Newport News, Hampton, Portsmouth, Suffolk, Williamsburg, Yorktown, Virginia Beach, Richmond, Gloucester, and more.
One Stop Driver Improvement Clinic, LLC, was formed in late 2000 after its founders, discovered the growing need for driver education. With their military experience, 1 Stop Driver Improvement Clinic first provided their services to military facilities. As demand grew, they expanded to fill the need for certified, experienced, knowledgeable instructors to teach their curriculum.
Now, 1 Stop Driving School, LLC has become the premier driving-based curriculum provider throughout the state of Virginia. With 20+ years experience of instructing and teaching, all instructors are Master Training Specialist (MTS) certified. One Stop Driving School, LLC uses an array of instructional materials to provide the latest up-to-date driver improvement topics for classroom and online course.
name: 1 Stop Driving School, LLC

description:
2020 Connection is a global software company primarily serving the call center industry.   We created this software four years ago to use in our call center and campaign management business.  There weren't many to choose from, so we built our own.  
1.  Our system calls hundreds of consumers per minute and uses voice recognition to see if they are interested in learning more about your product, service or promotion.  Then your phone rings with ONLY the customers that had a positive response to your message and you complete the conversation with them. 
2. When you want more customers just turn up the dial speed. When you have talked to enough people for the day, turn the system off.  You also control the volume of calls, the timing those calls come in, and the daily costs to acquire those new customers.
3.  The DECYPHER gives you direct and immediate results.  You turn it on, run it for an hour, or a day and see how many new sales you've made.  You can immediately compare that to the cost of running it for that same amount of time.  No guess work.  The numbers don't lie and they're easy to see.  Most businesses don't know what to attribute growth to, be it signage, radio, tv, website, social media, etc.  Unless you poll your customers, you have no way to MEASURE your 'new customer acquisition' cost.  
4. Getting started is easy! Upload a dialing list of your target audience, (If you aren't familiar with dialing lists, we can provide a list of company's that specialize in the data you need) record a quick opening message you want your customers to hear, and assign your staff to answer calls. Then, turn it on and wait for calls from customers eager to learn and buy!
5. I'm sure you are wondering how much this costs. A test to see if it works for you is only $350. No other costs except dialing lists. You keep the sales generated from the test!
name: 2020 Connection
tagline: Your vision,  Our focus.

updates.text: Amazing work by an awesome company....#leadership #employeeengagement #culture #management  #hr #humanresources #inclusion #DEI #accountability #Insights #leadershipdevelopment  #2020insights #engagement #employeeexperience  #diversity #diversityandinclusion

A year ago we set off on a journey to understand what would help businesses do more good. Why? Because we are at a moment in history when the challenges we face are significant, but so are the available resources to tackle them. Yet much of this resource is held in the innovative power of businesses.There are so many businesses already passionately playing their part, from Covid recovery to dealing with climate change. Yet, over the year we found that there were certain reforms that could make a big difference to helping business leaders make a positive difference. The report is summarised with this three point action plan for government and other organisations supporting purpose-driven businesses:1. Provide global leadership on impact measurement to make it easier to report and understand a company’s impact on society.2. Create a clear, obvious legal framework for purpose-driven companies.3. Turbo-charge support for companies wishing to profitably tackle the challenges we face such as recovering from Covid-19, reaching net zero and levelling up the UK.Read the whole paper here https://lnkd.in/dPJd6ah

Thinking of getting rid of performance reviews at your company?  What does that 'really' mean?  #leadership #employeeengagement #culture #management #hr #humanresources #inclusion #DEI #accountability #Insights #2020insights #engagement#culture #leadership #employeeexperience #employeeengagement #diversity #diversity #diversityandinclusionhttps://lnkd.in/dVGAhF7

updates.text: Every place has some values associated with it. If your values don’t match those of the people living in your city or town, you might eventually feel helpless and inadequate.
Traveling widens your horizon and teaches you to be happy and positive.
Where are you going on vacation?Nowhere. I’m going to read. I love reading.
She had an understanding, beyond language and beneath words, free of culture and upbringing, a universal something, received and recognized by an internal barometer.
When you travel in the world, you read from the vast expanse of human thought and experience, you realise you know so little.
To travel deeply is not measured by how far we travel, but how well we see.
Traveling is the best thing any couple can do. That’s how we had the idea of the honeymoon. Newly wed couples going to a new place on their own so that all they could have is each other.
Every life is a journey, regardless of whether you stay in one place, live like a global nomad, or end up being something in between.
Fly and travel far. Walk as if you were very close.
Anytime, any day, any season, Goa is always a good idea.

description:
It takes a myriad of professionals to turn this wheel we call the music business: radio air personalities, tour managers, record label insiders, specialists in television programming, directors of live events and publicists who provide artists with the exposure needed to keep the wheel in motion. Knowledge is power, and executive/entrepreneur Jeremy Westby is the power behind 2911 Enterprises. Westby is the rare individual whose twenty-five years of experience in the music industry champions each of those arenas—on a multi genre level in all realms. After all, how many people can say they’ve worked side by side with Megadeth, Meat Loaf, Micheal W. Smith and Dolly Parton? Westby can.

“I want 2911 to be a change agent in the world: in entertainment, sports, politics, and in many different areas, because I think the world needs to hear good messages,” says Westby. “The world needs healing and inspiration, and if there is a way I can go about my day and provide inspiration, healing, hope, and change, I want to do that.”

As President & CEO of 2911 Media, Westby continues a working relationship with Country Music Hall of Famers The Oak Ridge Boys that began when he was in college. He also represents country legends Charley Pride, Lee Greenwood, Lacy J. Dalton, and Janie Fricke, pop/rock icons Wanda Jackson, Don McLean and Sam Moore, newcomers Lee Gantt, Sara Spicer, JD Shelburne and Patrick James, and acclaimed musicians Tim Atwood and Kyle Dillingham, among others.

“I created 2911 to be a vehicle for change in the world for the right reasons,” says Westby, who named the company after his favorite, namesake Bible verse, Jeremiah 29:11 -- For I know the plans I have for you, plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.
name: 2911 Enterprises, Inc.
tagline: Providing publicity, marketing, media strategy & branding services to actors, artists, athletes, authors and more!

description: 2Civility is the Illinois Supreme Court Commission on Professionalism's communication platform. The name itself celebrates our mission, honors our heritage and echoes our evolution: “2” because we are fostering transformation; “Civility” because it is the moral code that binds us together not only as a society but as legal professionals, encouraging a productive exchange of perspectives and rejecting disrespect for individuals or classes of people. As such, 2Civility will advocate and advance the highest standards of conduct among lawyers to better serve clients and society alike.Our charge is clearly stated by Supreme Court Rule 799: to promote greater integrity, professionalism and civility among Illinois lawyers and judges; to foster commitment to the elimination of bias and divisiveness within the legal and judicial systems; and to ensure those systems provide equitable, efficient and effective service to the citizens of Illinois.As the Supreme Court states in Rule 799(c), our duties include:1. Promoting an awareness of professionalism, including generating, gathering and maintaining professionalism resources2. Monitoring, approving and assisting with professional responsibility CLE3. Collaborating with law schools on professionalism programs4. Facilitating cooperation among practitioners, bar associations, law schools, courts, civic and lay organizations on matters of professionalism, ethics, and public understanding of the legal systemConnecting lawyers to one another and to the core values of our profession is increasingly important amidst the rapid changes of the 21st century. We are more than up to the task. In the process of doing so, we are seeing, thinking, and acting in ways that provide a greater sense of purpose and reward within the legal profession as we strive to make the world a better place for one and all..

description:
2L is a professional MEP consulting engineering practice based in New York with a passion for building design and MEP services and energy integration.


2LS was formed in 2011 with a vision and desire to influence the industry with a wide range of international and local experience in Building Services Engineering and Energy consultancy.


We pride ourselves on our detailed design of building services MEP systems. We aim to deliver the best value and efficiency within capital cost constraints by working closely with the Design and Construction teams.


As MEP engineers we seek to provide integrated, efficient and elegant systems for our Clients for the internal environment and critical operation of their facilities, while providing the appropriate degree of flexibility and future adaptability. As environmental engineers we seek to incorporate a global view of energy consumption, embodied energy and sustainability into the design wherever possible.


Our team focuses on Clients, Architects and the Design Team at large, contributing to problem solving technically and efficiently. We define Client expectations early in the design process and by establishing the level of performance required of the end product, we can provide advice on the appropriate procurement route.

2L provides the following engineering services for new and existing buildings:

•	Strategic design 
•	Mechanical and environmental systems
•	Energy use and environmental studies
•	Plumbing systems
•	Fire protection and life safety
•	Master planning
•	Site assessments
•	Electrical systems
•	Lighting design
•	IT, Tel/Data systems
•	Security systems

Each bottle of 1Hour Break® contains natural anti-anxiety herbs to help reduce stress. 1Hour Break® is incredibly discrete and easy to use; simply pull 1Hour Break® out of your pocket or purse and spray under your tongue to begin to feel calm in seconds.

The main ingredient in 1Hour Break® is derived from kava kava root. Kava has naturally calming properties that ease your anxiety without interfering with mental sharpness and other cognitive functions. 1Hour Break® is made in the USA and hand crafted in small batches from organic and wild-harvested plants, herbs, and flowers. With its synergistic blend of kava and lobelia herb, 1Hour Break® can also be used as a natural aid to stop smoking by helping manage the nerves and anxiety associated with the difficulty and failure to quit smoking. The calming properties of kava and passion flower in 1Hour Break® also work as a natural sleep aid by providing an instant sensation of calm to help ease your restless thoughts and relax your muscles so you can focus on getting a good night’s sleep. All the ingredients in 1Hour Break® are non-GMO, all natural, vegan, gluten free, kosher certified, and non-habit forming.

1Hour Break® is safe and effective for daily use. It is also endorsed by naturopathic doctors as a practical solution for stress and anxiety.

Contact us today for retail, wholesale, and online affiliate opportunities available. Email support@1hourbreak.com or call 877.500.6005 for program details.
name: 1Hour Break

description: 1st Nor Cal Credit Union is a cooperative financial institution, helping our members achieve their financial goals since 1949. We offer a wide variety of products and services, backed by our commitment to the credit union philosophy, "people helping people". We serve over 30,000 members with branch locations in Martinez, Richmond, Benicia, Pittsburg, Brentwood and Crockett.Those eligible for membership at 1st Nor Cal Credit Union include any and all persons who live, regularly work, currently attend school, or currently worship in Contra Costa, Solano, or Alameda counties, as well as any and all businesses, corporations, and other legal entities in those counties.1st Nor Cal Credit Union is a not-for-profit financial cooperative. Credit unions do not issue stock or pay dividends to outside stockholders, like most other financial institutions. Instead, earnings are returned to our members in the form of lower loan rates, higher interest on deposits, and lower fees. We exist to serve our members, not to make a profit.Each credit union member has equal ownership and one vote, regardless of how much money you have on deposit. At 1st Nor Cal Credit Union, you’re both a member and an owner.We are governed by a board of directors, elected by and from the credit union’s membership. Board members serve voluntarily.
name: 1st Northern California Credit Union
tagline: People Helping People. It's what we LOVE to do at 1st Nor Cal.

description:
Many of today’s training resources are not only out-of-date, but also dangerously incomplete. These deficiencies can put your department or employees at risk of burnout, injury or – worse case – even line-of-duty deaths, not to mention the less-than-best practices that can bring inefficiency to your operations.

Recognizing the need for a better solution, 2 The Rescue was established to provide field-tested safety techniques and emotional wellness strategies to better prepare your employees for the actual on-the-job experiences that they face each and every day. The latest developments and industry best practices are integral to all that we do.

2 The Rescue training is presented by experienced instructors who have successfully performed all the techniques, strategies and maneuvers live and in the field. The organization’s needs-specific training is at once innovative, cost effective and designed to lay a solid foundation for managing everyday tasks. This includes the life-threatening conflicts and risks that are involved not only in line-of-duty occupations but elsewhere among drivers, educators and others.

Throughout it, we will enhance your ability to properly evaluate a situation and make timely decisions – thereby limiting not only your liability but also more importantly reducing the chance of harmful stress, injury and death to your team.

Our Team and Mission Statement:
Headed by two public safety professionals combining more than 45 years of experience, the 2 The Rescue team has witnessed many preventable deaths of co-workers as well as citizens. In light of this, the team’s mission is to reduce these tragedies by presenting affordable, convenient and passionate educational programs that increase awareness, modify behavior and change the attitudes of the civilian and public safety community.

The Parklands is comprised of four parks—Beckley Creek Park, Pope Lick Park, Turkey Run Park and Broad Run Park—stretching from Shelbyville Road to Bardstown Road. All four parks are now open to the public and are connected by 19 miles of the Louisville Loop, a scenic park drive and include more than 60 miles of trails for hiking, biking and paddling. 

The Parklands is free to enter, open 365 days a year, from dawn to dusk.

The Parklands does not receive tax dollars for annual upkeep or operations. Ongoing maintenance and operations are funded solely through private donations and an endowment fund.
