description:
2Fold Doors was originally named Two-Fold, LLC and was formed to sell the 2Fold® product line to consumers, architects, builders developers and resellers throughout the US.  The first product to market was the 2F-8000 movable window wall or bi-folding door system.  2Fold Doors is now a trade style of Mullionz LLC, the company that engineered the system.  

Over the last 2 years, 2Fold® has expanded to be a full-function steel window & door manufacture complete with in-swing and out-swing single and French doors as well as casement, awning and hopper windows.  The line was completed with a mullion and fixed window group to supply the largest of fenestration openings.

2fold® is unique in that it is a hybrid profile system which utilizes fully welded steel sash frames for strength and Accoya® wood for superior thermal properties and unequaled aesthetic appeal on the inside.  It is a hot-rolled steel window/door system by nature with its sashes having only a 1" wide face profile.

A patent is pending on both this hybrid profile design and the 2.1 locking system that allows for fully concealed cremone (simultaneous top and bottom lock engagement operated by a single lever) locking.  No commercially available hardware would work inside of the very small 1" sash profile.

The 2Fold® system has been tested to rigorous standards for air infiltration, water infiltration and structure.  Additionally, the 2F-8000 system is listed with NRFC and qualifies for Energy Star in all 50 states.

We are at the beginning of a long trail and look forward to consumer and professional input to guide our development.  Get results with the WORLD'S THINNEST DOOR SYSTEM and its cousins.
name: 2Fold Doors
tagline: Big Glass Doors, Skinny Frames, and 35% more glass!

description: At 2W Technologies, INC, we take on information technology (IT) projects of all sizes while offering 24/7 support. We specialize in Epicor enterprise resource planning (ERP), IT infrastructure, cloud and managed services solutions for organizations throughout the US. Many of our solutions are geared toward manufacturing, but we target verticals of all varieties with our products and services. We employ a large team of IT and Epicor consultants trained to analyze our clients’ needs individually and recommend solutions to meet those objectives. As an Epicor-certified Channel Partner and a value-added reseller for Epicor solutions and services, 2W Tech offers several services and products to help clients acquire, configure, install and manage the software that powers their businesses.Cloud technologies have become a large part of our solution set. 2W Tech is a Tier I Microsoft Cloud Solutions Provider and helped many of our clients scale their entire network to 99.995% uptime with the use of Microsoft Azure. Our goal is to help organizations learn about the business benefits Azure Cloud can bring, whether deployed in one application or throughout their entire organization. 2W Tech also offers ongoing management and monitoring of networks, hardware, software and other related IT systems throughout our clients’ companies. Our remote monitoring and management (RMM) platform continually monitors the stability and security of your IT network so you can experience maximum network uptime, increase your efficiency and focus on your core business functions.More recently, 2W Tech has launched our Cyber Security Compliance Program. This endeavor helps clients reach and maintain compliance with regulatory mandates including the International Traffic in Arms Regulations (ITAR), Service Organization Controls (SOC), the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST), General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS).

description:
3 Chopt provides software and custom IT Infrastructure work for the Healthcare industry. 3 Chopt's core product offering consists of the Payment Receipt Journal (PRJ) and the Revenue Control System (RCS). 

The Payment Receipt Journal is a unique front office solution the "tracks the money" from all sources and provides a front end merchant solution allowing providers to accept and process all types of payments through a single system interface. The Revenue Control System is a robust financial engine that bridges revenue cycle functions with finance. RCS is unique for its highly configurable and scalable design allowing it to work alongside and in conjunction with virtually any existing technology environment. RCS manages unallocated funds, remit allocations, and provides inter-organizational system management by balancing collections and internal reconciliations with external systems such as bank deposits and settlement files.In addition RCS provides real-time monitoring of all payment activity and balances payment and deposit systems to the penny daily while creating a fully auditable system of record.

3 Chopt also has developed a set of tools known as the 3 Chopt Application Architecture (3CAA) designed to solve a myriad of common problems with broken or manual processes that exist within hospital business offices. 3 Chopt offers a 360 degree payment management analysis that consists of an on-site assessment to help finance professionals better understand how to manage and account for revenue across the system while offering "quick win" solutions in areas that typically have manual processes or home-grown systems

3 Chopt systems provide an extraordinary value relative to similar larger healthcare IT provider solutions and work equally well in large geographically diverse provider networks as well as providing smaller hospitals solutions previously unavailable.
name: 3 Chopt

description:
3-D ETC (Experiential Training Company) provides unique industrial and patient safety training.  By blending interactive safety awareness class instruction together with realistic 3D video, (viewed through our head mounted display unit), our programs capture peoples’ attention and touch them emotionally, resulting in an immediate and lasting positive shift in attitude, mindset and performance. 

Why 3D technology for safety training?  It’s all about impact. Studies have shown that immersive 3D training has a much higher impact on people than traditional training. It is compelling, life-like, and memorable. Our immersion technology puts the participant in the middle of the action and the binaural sound creates hyper-real audio fidelity.  The net effect is to engage the senses and create the space for long-term retention of the information – something that is sorely missing in most of today’s training programs.

3-D ETC can customize our safety training programs to personalize and meet the needs of each client, or create new 3D videos and programs to address key safety issues for your ogranization.

We offer various delivery options for providing 3D immersive training to our customers - a POD  for 12 participants at a time, a single user Kiosk, or a mobile 2-pack, 6-pack and 12-pack.
name: 3-D ETC, LLC

"Failing is a part of life – it happens to everyone, in all walks of life. In the context of new ventures, it can be seen acutely: as many as 90% of startups fail. As much as we shy away from failure, it often holds important truths: it helps us learn from our mistakes, allows us to pivot and adapt, and builds character and resilience. This may partly explain why persistence in entrepreneurship pays off; studies find that a defining psychological trait of entrepreneurs is their ability to learn from failure."We love these insights! Thank you, LEGO Ventures & The LEGO Foundation! #learning #creativity #creativeconfidence #resilience #entrepreneurs #entrepreneurship #innovation #futureofwork #startups #startup #entrepreneurshipeducation #creativityatwork #creativityskills

Entrepreneurship can create social and economic value simultaneously.  The key activities of social enterprises often compel widespread change in mindsets and business operations across industries. Social entrepreneurs and their ventures can influence other organizations to take action for impact in three ways:1. Demonstrating that it is viable to do business more sustainably;  Providing inspiration, insights, and offering up new models for replication.2. Building the appeal of circular business models for consumers, employees, and investors.3. Challenging the status quo of what is generally considered acceptable (or not) when it comes to sustainability and inclusiveness.We are thrilled to offer social entrepreneurship programming in collaboration with our long standing partner, The Strome Entrepreneurship Center at Old Dominion University. Brazil is one of the most entrepreneurial countries in the world, with over 40% of the population self-identifying as entrepreneurs according to the Global Entrepreneurship Monitor. This warm climate for entrepreneurship offers a unique opportunity to foster inclusive ecosystems. Thanks to support from U.S. Embassy and Consulates in Brazil, in October and November, the Brazil Entrepreneurship Activation Series will engage 100+ Brazilian students, entrepreneurs, and ecosystem supporters. Through training, mentorship, and networking, this program will develop mindset & skills, enable new ventures, and inspire community leadership. The Activation Series also aims to strengthen the  YLAI / Young Leaders of the Americas Initiative Professional Fellows Program by cultivating entrepreneurial capabilities in previously underrepresented groups. 3DS is honored to be a part of this initiative and eager to meet each cohort of aspiring entrepreneurs from Manaus and Goiania! description:
Why buy from us? 

We started by traveling to Japan, tasting matcha from dozens of farms to find the best, and importing their matcha directly to us. Then, we found ways to keep our matcha as fresh as possible, going the extra mile to ensure quality. Simply put, we believe in providing nothing short of the best possible matcha experience. Whether you’re a matcha lover or trying it for the first time, our matcha will taste great and make you feel vibrant.

What does it mean to feel vibrant?

It means embracing a more satisfying, energetic, and productive lifestyle; being full of vigor and movement. It means investing in the connection between your body and your mind. Vibrancy means experiencing the mood-boosting health benefits of matcha, like antioxidants and amino acids. From the beginning, our mission has been to bring together customers who have been looking for a way to help them feel vibrant. We are building a community of matcha drinkers who strive to improve themselves one cup at a time. Come join us!

description:
305 Homes is a real estate company that assists clients with buying and selling luxury properties throughout South Florida. The company’s branding incorporates the “305” area code which is synonymous to Miami and recognized throughout the world. Its primary goals are to provide clients with professionalism, confidentiality and an integrated marketing approach to sell their homes quickly and for the highest price.

The company was formed by Corey Schwartz, a licensed Real Estate Broker, who has handled residential and commercial sales since 2004. As a real estate professional, Schwartz is an expert in marketing homes, negotiating complex transactions and providing clients with detailed market research.

Prior to starting 305 Homes, Schwartz founded College Town Living in 2006 to help students, parents, alumni, employees and property owners buy, sell and rent homes near the University of Miami. The company has become the most recognizable provider of collegiate real estate services in Coral Gables and the neighboring community. 

Before his real estate career, Schwartz spent four years as a Corporate Sales Executive with the Miami Heat basketball organization and two years as the Director of Marketing for the University of Miami Athletic Department. He is also alumnus of the University of Miami having received his Bachelor of Business Administration in May 1999.
name: The 305 Homes Team
tagline: Selling the Hottest Area Code

description: We are a 100% pure volunteer 501c3 organization with the mission to build, maintaining, and manage a USA BMX sanctioned bicycle race track in North Platte NE. Our goal is to also provide a pump track, a mountain bike recreational area, and a radio controlled vehicle park for our community and region. We believe there is a void in our region of fun, safe, and healthy activities that our youth and their families can enjoy for little to no cost. The sport of BMX has been alive since the early 70's and has only grown in popularity since. BMX was the first "action" sport to be allowed as an official Olympic sport when it was introduced in 2008. Since then it has paved the way for other "action" sports to be considered and allowed into the Olympics. In 2020 the sports of surfing, skateboarding, and sport climbing will be introduced because of the popularity that BMX has brought to the games.
name: 308 BMX, INC

description:
38 North is a website devoted to informed analysis of North Korea.

While it strives to break new ground, the site’s main objective is to bring the best possible analysis to both seasoned North Korea watchers and general audiences alike. Too often analysis of the North is permeated by inexperience, littered with inaccurate information or grounded in poorly deduced reasoning. We believe no one really knows for sure what is going on in North Korea, but we can at least try to understand the possibilities. Similarly, anyone who professes certainty should be viewed with the greatest skepticism.

To accomplish these objectives, 38 North harnesses the experience of long-time observers of North Korea and others who have dealt directly with North Koreans. It draws on other experts outside the field who might bring fresh, well-informed insights to those of us who follow North Korea.

38 North covers not only North Korea’s weapons of mass destruction, but digs beneath the surface of political, economic, social and other developments. North Korea is not a hermit kingdom, but rather a country that has been in the throes of change, good and bad, for over a decade. Those changes have important implications for the Korean peninsula, the East Asian region and the international community.

38 North strives as much as possible for ideological balance, publishing opposing opinions, and utilizes various technologies to analyze military, economic, social and other developments north of the DMZ. While it is an American-based project, it draws on experts from around the world to provide international perspectives as well.
name: 38 North

description: 3D Predict is a clear aligner manufacturer. Our aligners are driven by artificial intelligence that predictably helps treat ALL cases of complexity. Yep, we can do what most people think only braces can do! Working to boost treatment effectiveness and reduce the number of refinements, our team created software driven by artificial intelligence (AI) called Deep CBCT Analysis.We saw a way to combine clinical experience and cutting-edge AI technology to equip orthodontists with an aligner that helps treat even the most complex cases with greater precision and efficiency.With Deep CBCT Analysis, orthodontists can effectively straighten teeth while keeping them within the alveolar housing — looking beyond a tooth crown to see the real roots and bone. This AI-driven software creates highly precise 3D models of crowns, bones, and actual roots with every detail of the apex visible so each tooth can be deeply analyzed like never before. By seeing how roots will move versus the bone during treatment, orthodontists are able to achieve more predictable and safe outcomes for patients unlike anything else that’s currently available on the market.3D Predict was founded by Dr. Marina Domracheva. Her passion for mathematics drives our work in advanced technology to improve clinical effectiveness in dental care. Dr. Domracheva identified a gap in tooth straightening propositions available on the market and founded 3D Predict to inspire orthodontists to see the unseen and allow them to look beyond the evidence in treatment planning. Our clinical experts and 3D plan modeling technicians are among the best in the industry, the majority receiving deep orthodontic education.
name: 3D Predict
tagline: Aligners driven by artificial intelligence to treat all cases of complexity. Visit us @ GNYDM, Booth 901!

description:
Do you have an idea to make business easier using technology? Take your business idea to the next level with 3R Interactive. 

As a small/mid-sized company, have you ever thought to yourself:  “X” would be so much easier if only we had a more customized technological solution?  Or maybe you’re an entrepreneur with an idea for an app or online-business with the potential to reshape your industry. Yet, whichever you are, you lack the know-how to achieve your goal.

As your on-demand chief technical officer (CTO), 3R Interactive helps turn your vision into reality.

What is a chief technical officer? A CTO works alongside your technical start-up team as an IT and business mentor. A CTO can help you:

- Validate your idea
- Develop and test your solution
- Manage developers
- Train junior teams or hire talent
- Develop practical project timelines
- Minimize IT-risks
- Prepare your idea to present to investors

As an on-demand adviser, the flexibility in service meets your small business needs and budget. 3r Interactive uses our technical and business knowledge to help you first and foremost determine if there is a market for your product or idea. This saves you time, money, and grants your peace of mind.

As your idea grows and develops, 3R Interactive acts as the liaison between you and your technical team to achieve the product you desire. As your external set of eyes, we can identify internal struggles and inefficiencies that could be improved with custom software tools or a better trained technical staff.

When you’re ready to take your idea to investors, 3R Interactive is here to support you in that next step too. Adding 3r Tech Strategy’s name as your technology advisor to your pitch deck will make your company more attractive to venture capitalists.

Are you ready to get started?

Take your business idea to the next level by expanding your technical team with the help of 3r Interactive. Contact us today for a free 30-minute consultation.
name: 3r Interactive LLC
tagline: As your on-demand chief technical officer (CTO), 3r Interactive helps turn your technology vision into reality.

description:
3SPOKE is a growth-stage venture capital firm that invests in the talented individuals who are building the next generation of visionary and disruptive global companies.  Elite venture-backed technology companies continue to mature and grow larger and more valuable while remaining privately held, creating enormous pent-up demand for liquidity from their stakeholders. 

3SPOKE’s mission is to provide balanced liquidity solutions for this dynamic ecosystem. Utilizing an innovative financing structure combining attractive features of debt and equity, we offer individual shareholders and their companies a highly favorable form of capital. Utilized as an alternative to a secondary market sale or to provide for the capital necessary for employees to exercise their stock options and purchase their shares, 3SPOKE’s solutions are designed to maximize value and minimize risk and disruption. Either structured individually to solve a specific problem or in a coordinated liquidity program tailored to the whole company’s needs, 3SPOKE is a trusted and experienced partner.  

We are proud to count these fantastic companies among our prior investment portfolio: AirBnB, Box, DocuSign, DOMO, GitHub, HootSuite, Lending Club, Lithium Technologies, MongoDB, Palantir, Pinterest, Telogis, Uber and Zuora.
name: 3SPOKE
tagline: Providing alternatives to private company secondary market sales or capital for employees to exercise stock options

description:
Knowledge. Experience. Connection. Transparency. These are our 4 steps to achieving a goal.

Our main priority is to provide realistic guidance and advice to rising high school student-athlete, getting their their names out there and noticed by recruiting college and universities. We launch a progressive plan of clear  initiatives for sport faculties of potential schools to become exposed to available talent and ultimately, provide the opportunity for possible scholarship. In full compliance with the NCAA, we serve as a bridge to possible success.

We create an individualized plan for each of our clients in order to further their collegiate endeavors as academic scholars prepared for college and as athletes prepared to contribute to an institution's athletics. We provide realistic, experience-supported, and results-driven guidance in the following: fitness and training, diet and nutrition, standardized exam preparation, academic and study skills. We structure a plan of present- and future-oriented steps towards promoting each student-athlete's unique talents to potential schools looking to provide sport scholarships. Recruitment requires knowledge & exposure - this is why we are here.

We provide the following services: personalized 1-1 advisory sessions, academic and physical fitness, performance evaluation and follow-up consultation, drill and game filming and video editing, academic portfolio assistance, high school resume advice for college admissions, interview practice, standardized exam prep, fitness training and diet counseling, transparent communication and realistic college and career advice based on student merit and goals, document transfer and communication to-and-from potential schools. 

4'n Goal's mission is simple. We want everyone to succeed throughout all walks of life. We pride ourselves upon our clients' success. Their success is our success!

Advising/Counseling – Where we shine is giving real life advice based on real-world experiences, but to counsel you on the possible dangers that could stop each client from reaching their goals. Our advice does not only pertain to the student-athlete, but the parents as well. We strive to educate you on the right questions that you should be asking each college coach and admissions counselor.

Our Mission – Is to see that each client is in the correct school that fits with what they want to do for their future. Our job is not to see that you receive a scholarship, but to see that each client is getting the right education that is going to lead to a possible great career.

Company policies – One of our most important policies is communication on both sides (us and our client). We can not function without communication. We also like to stay in full contact with our clients' parents (*not the student-athlete). We feel that our one-on-one sessions need to be the time for them to ask us question that they have been thinking. The parents are the backbone to their student-athletes' success; we are just another tool to help sharpen the edge of their minds. We do not discriminate on gender, sex, religion or creed.

Military service – Currently we have a member that is serving in our Armed Forces for our country. That member will not be available at certain times throughout the year. Schedules and times will be discussed and given to our clients.
name: 4'n Goal

updates.text: Insightful article from Dr. Augustine Fou in Forbes last week.Artist Sells Invisible Sculpture—Adtech Sells The Same ThingEnjoy the first few sentences:This week comes the headline “Artist sells an invisible sculpture for £13,000.”Do you think the buyer wasted his money?He got the “certificate of authenticity” though, so it must be real, right?Ridicule the silly buyer all you want, but this is exactly what had been happening for the last ten years in digital advertising, when programmatic ad buying got a foothold and took off. https://lnkd.in/gg2thf5

A recent study (“Board to Death”) from the marketing tech firm Bango suggested that CEOs of major corporations aren't nearly as mesmerized by the magic of online media as their marketing departments may be. The study of 200 CEOs reported that:-  62% believe that too much of their digital marketing budget is wasted-  60% believe that the effectiveness of social media has been "exaggerated"-  77% do not regard digital advertising as “a reliable source of new customers or sales.” https://lnkd.in/gx3FndK

In the past 90 days, Circle K has tested Sip & Save in more than 100 stores.Early results indicate that customers are visiting more frequently and in numbers surpassing Circle K’s expectations. Circle K has been upgrading its hot food options, and trial customers are buying food with their drinks.Over the past year, the chain introduced new items in about 1,500 locations, and soon, it will expand them to an additional 3,000 stores. https://lnkd.in/gjUTkBE
Customer counts increasing as well across the country as well . . .https://lnkd.in/giaiJ4s

Convenience retailers anticipate leisure travel and routine customer trips will return to pre-pandemic levels this summer, according to a new survey of c-store owners by NACS Research. However, for now, demand for gasoline remains considerably below pre-pandemic levels according to a report from the Oil Price Information Service (OPIS). The lingering effects of unemployment, cuts in events, and hybrid models for commuting that still allow for working from home, will influence if and when demand returns to pre-pandemic levels. https://lnkd.in/grqaf8W

Many of the biggest spenders in digital are approaching it as if it were a reach and frequency medium like TV. They want to show their ad to as many people as possible, as often as possible. And digital seemingly gives them unlimited ad impressions to buy. But much of the large quantity of ad impressions and low CPM prices come from fake or fraudulent websites and mobile apps that are simply feasting on the ad dollars using fake ad impressions and fake traffic (bots).https://lnkd.in/gvUAuzT #marketingandadvertising #fraudprevention

360 Solutions was created through the merger of two thriving companies from opposite sides of Missouri, each with advanced capabilities in the collection, harvesting and distribution of automotive cores and commodities.

Founded in 1992 in St. Louis, MCI Cores built a reputation as a leader and innovator in processing "Small" automotive cores - including complex electrical, A/C, brakes, rotating electrical and hydraulic parts.  

Founded in 2013 in Liberty, Automotive Commodity Exchange (ACE) quickly became an industry leader in "Big" part processing - including engines, transmissions, transfer cases and rear end cores.

The merger of these 2 companies in 2016, formed the basis of 360 Solutions and allows the company to focus on its vision for the future of automotive recycling, a vision based on years of industry experience, data-driven operations, technological innovation and unparalleled service to both our vendors and our customers.

description:
3D Environmental is an environmental consulting company providing clients with cost effective, reliable solutions to their environmental issues including, environmental due diligence, environmental compliance and environmental management. 3D was founded in 1996 as one office in Tulsa, OK. We are now four offices – Tulsa, Oklahoma City, Houston and Austin.

OUR PARTNERS
Kurt Lampi, the founder of 3D, is one of the premier environmental due diligence professionals in our area. With 30 years of experience, he possesses an expert knowledge of the standards for conducting various levels of environmental site assessments (ESAs), as well as an understanding of the various risk-based state remediation standards, such Texas Risk Reduction Program (TRRP) and the Louisana Risk Evaluation/Corrective Action Program (RECAP). description:
Baking has always been associated with the comforts of home. In fact, bakers find simple and repetitive activities such as weighing dry ingredients, whisking eggs, and mixing batter to be therapeutic due to its meditative quality. It is not surprising that Iea’sha “Phenix” Lastra, founder and chief baker of 3 Lily’s Pastry Shop is passionate about baking. In fact, she can’t remember a time when she didn’t love to bake.
Baked goods evoke a sense of home. The smells and feelings associated with baking always trigger good memories. At 3 Lily’s Pastry Shop, we look forward to nourishing the body as well as the soul. We also allow our creativity to take the lead as we bake our pastries, resulting in great-looking desserts that are a feast for the eyes as well as the tongue. We believe that our baked desserts and pastries are always meant to be shared. Our founder Iea’sha Lastra just loves watching the look on people’s faces as they bite into her delicious treats. Homemade pastries symbolize comfort, nourishment, a sense of home, and love.
Cakes and pastries are life’s perfect sweet treats. Since our baked goodies come from a place of love, we only use the finest and freshest ingredients. Our baked goods and desserts are of the highest quality, and we use the real thing. We do not scrimp on real flavors and we don’t use second-rate substitutes. Our food is scrumptiously authentic – with no artificial ingredients and extenders. Each bite is a perfect morsel and baked from the heart.
At 3 Lily’s Pastry Shop, you can taste and feel the love with every delicious bite! We believe that our customers deserve the best – that is why we are dedicated to giving them the highest quality baked goods and desserts. Since we don’t compromise on ingredients and preparation, we can only produce our specially-made baked goods in limited quantities. Taste and experience the difference at 3 Lily’s Pastry Shop.
name: 3 Lily's Pastry Shop

description: 3PM is a data analytics company for e-commerce that provides solutions to increase revenue and drive operational excellence. 3PM did not focus on a specific brand or category, but collects data as it appears on the online retailers website across the entire e-commerce ecosystem. Our competitors provide brands with the typical retail data, but some of the most valuable data is unstructured and is not offered or limited through their APIs. To do this, we leverage machine learning and other forms of artificial intelligence to collect, organize and analyze the unstructured data at scale. 3PM Watch provides brands, agencies and software partners with a solution to QC, manage and improve listing content across the entire e-commerce ecosystem. 3PM collects data as it appears on the online retailers website-- what we see is what customers see, even by zip code.  Our intelligent automation reduces the manual task so teams can focus on the important decisions. 3PM Data Warehouse for business intelligence. Is the most recent offering for brands, agencies and software partners to get access to raw e-commerce data. This access provides stakeholders with competitive data and the ability to combine external and internal data to uncover opportunities to increase revenues. 3PM Connect is a solution for consumer questions and product reviews. Most of our competitors rely on Amazon’s API for this service; therefore, they are missing the brands’s product reviews.  3PM’s platform allows stakeholders to use this data for product and customer experience across e-commerce partners, supply chain issues and product development.
name: 3PM Solutions
tagline: Data Analytics for Ecommerce
